ProjectTitle: Identification of proviral host factor combinations as drug targets for viruses with pandemic potential
InitialFeedbackHistory:
29/06/2023
Data: Please note that human cells are considered human bodily material and the use needs to be registered at the ethical committee, for more information see https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/guidance/humanmaterial
Metadata: The MIBBI may have interesting metadata standards for your work, eg MINSEQE, MIxS, MIQE see https://fairsharing.org/MIBBI. 
Sharing, Since you don't mention factors restricting sharing, it is easier to make your data available in a data repository, for example KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or the EBI repositories (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/). For more information see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
